name: HappyXmas
description:
Help snow maiden to collect all presents in time. Challenge your friends for APM and faster brain memory at single player or multiplayer.
- Simply three in a row game mechanic
- Top player name and stat at main screen
- Fast memory and APM challenge
- Multiplayer support over internet
- Insane difficulty available after complete at hard level
- Secret hint available after complete insane level
- Secret allow to enable local multiplayer game, insane level at new device, another chiptune music
- Multiplayer at insane level have ability to deduct -1 pts from enemy player, if he stays at element during you closing it.
